content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: magma_block
inventory=[{"type": "snow", "quantity": 6, "index": 11}, {"type": "tnt_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 2, "index": 17}, {"type": "composter", "quantity": 27, "index": 23}, {"type": "golden_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 31, "index": 27}, {"type": "purple_stained_glass", "quantity": 5, "index": 29}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 57, "index": 30}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 63, "index": 31}, {"type": "light_blue_dye", "quantity": 60, "index": 32}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 63, "index": 35}, {"type": "granite_slab", "quantity": 30, "index": 36}, {"type": "brown_dye", "quantity": 19, "index": 37}, {"type": "golden_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "cauldron", "quantity": 60, "index": 39}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "diamond_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "slime_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]

thought: I need to craft magma_cream and then magma_block. Magma_cream needs blaze_powder and slime_ball, and I have 2 blaze_rods, so I will smelt one of them into blaze_powder. Blaze_rods are in slot 17, and I will move one of them to the crafting table in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1
